name: cloudequivalent
description: A guide to public cloud services and what the equivalent is with other providers

scripts.watch: npm run generate && eleventy --serve & postcss website/_assets/scss/main.scss --o _tmp/style.css --watch
scripts.build: npm run generate && ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true eleventy && NODE_ENV=production postcss website/_assets/scss/main.scss --o build/style.css

author: [Jake Mulley](https://github.com/jakemulley)
